artist: Calligraphy by Hon'ami Kōetsu; Underpainting by Tawaraya Sōtatsu
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: four lines of calligraphy of varying sizes on silver paper with ivy leaves in gold
inscription: {Aki no tsuji yamabe sayakani / teraseru wa / ochiru momiji no / kazu o miyo toka.} (The autumn moon shines brilliantly upon the mountains, illuminating every fallen colored leaf.)
medium: Ink and gold on silver-decorated paper
title: Poem from the Collection of Japanese Poems of Ancient and Modern Times (Kokin wakashū)
